snippet: A sculpture from David Smith’s “Cubi” series has been donated to the Whitney Museum of American Art and Storm King Art Center.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Lipman Family Foundation gives a sculpture by David Smith jointly to the Whitney Museum of American Art and the Storm King Arts Center in Mountainville, NY; Sotheby's will auction a Sayed Haider Raza painting which was once owned by John D Rockefeller III; Damian Hirst offers a personalized print to anyone who can prove that they saw the entire exhibition of his Spot paintings, which is distributed among Gagosian's 11 galleries around the world.
lead_paragraph: A sculpture from David Smith’s “Cubi” series has been donated to the Whitney Museum of American Art and Storm King Art Center.

headline.seo: Whitney and Storm King to Share a David Smith
headline.main: Whitney and Storm King to Share a David Smith
headline.print_headline: Whitney and Storm King To Share a David Smith
